definitions.definition: Precisely agreeing with a standard , a fact , or the truth ; perfectly conforming ; neither exceeding nor falling short in any respect.
examples: an exact copy of a letter

definitions.definition: Habitually careful to agree with a standard, a rule , or a promise ; accurate; methodical ; punctual .
examples: a man exact in observing an appointment
In my doings I was exact .

definitions.definition: Precisely or definitely conceived or stated; strict .
Such that the kernel of each morphism is the image of the preceding one.
labels: of a sequence of morphisms in an abelian category
definitions.label_groups: not comparable , homological algebra , of a sequence of morphisms in an abelian category

definitions.definition: Such that it preserves short exact sequences .
labels: of a functor of abelian categories
definitions.label_groups: not comparable , homological algebra , of a functor of abelian categories

main_definition: Precisely agreeing with a standard , a fact , or the truth ; perfectly conforming ; neither exceeding nor falling short in any respect.
secondary_definitions: Habitually careful to agree with a standard, a rule , or a promise ; accurate; methodical ; punctual .
Precisely or definitely conceived or stated; strict .
( not comparable , homological algebra , of a sequence of morphisms in an abelian category ) Such that the kernel of each morphism is the image of the preceding one.
( not comparable , homological algebra , of a functor of abelian categories ) Such that it preserves short exact sequences .
